actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Galveston, Ind., for airport purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to grant a release to the city of Galveston, Indiana, from all of the restrictions in the deed conveying specified real property to such city for airport purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to release restrictions on the use of certain property conveyed to the city of Galveston, Ind., for airport purposes.
